Title: Relates to the protection of people with special needs regarding controlled substances and medical marihuana
Summary: Relates to the protection of people with special needs regarding controlled substances and medical marihuana.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the protection of people with special needs regarding controlled substances and medical marihuana
